tool_description: Trains various forecasting models including ARIMA, exponential smoothing, neural networks, and ensemble methods using historical wind and weather data for turbine output prediction.

training_features.description: Feature matrix for model training as formatted strings

model_type.description: Model type: arima, lstm, random_forest, gradient_boost, neural_net, ensemble

early_stopping.description: Enable early stopping for neural networks

error_messages: Data size mismatch: Training features and target variable must have equal number of samples.
Insufficient training data: At least 100 samples required for reliable model training.
Invalid model type: Use one of [arima, lstm, random_forest, gradient_boost, neural_net, ensemble].
Invalid validation split: Validation split must be between 0.1 and 0.4.
Invalid CV folds: Cross-validation folds must be between 3 and 10.
Invalid forecast horizon: Forecast horizon must be positive and less than training data length.
Feature format error: Training features must be properly formatted numeric data.
Hyperparameter error: Provided hyperparameters are incompatible with selected model type.
usage: Provide feature matrix and target values for training. Select appropriate model type for your forecasting needs. Configure validation and cross-validation parameters for robust model evaluation.
